references.paper_title: Depth map prediction from a single image using a multi-scale deep network
references.reason: This paper introduced a foundational multi-scale deep convolutional neural network architecture for monocular depth estimation, significantly advancing the field.

references.paper_title: AdaBins: Depth estimation using adaptive bins
references.reason: This work proposed AdaBins, a method using adaptive bins for depth estimation, which improved accuracy and addressed limitations of previous regression-based approaches.

references.paper_title: LocalBins: Improving depth estimation by learning local distributions
references.reason: Building upon AdaBins, LocalBins further enhanced depth estimation accuracy by focusing on learning local depth distributions within image patches.

references.paper_title: Multi-modal masked pre-training for monocular panoramic depth completion
references.reason: This paper introduced a multi-modal masked pre-training approach for monocular depth completion, improving performance by leveraging additional data modalities and pre-training strategies.

references.paper_title: Neural window fully-connected crfs for monocular depth estimation
references.reason: This work presented a novel method using neural window fully-connected conditional random fields (CRFs) for monocular depth estimation, achieving state-of-the-art results on several benchmark datasets.
